comments:
Eclipse build: i20030625 
VM: J9SC20030620 

Adding a Java Watch expression (not always - I don't know why) causes a NPE to
occur that will prevent the specified expression to be appear in the Expressions
view (although it can be selected, and has its value properly shown in the
Details pane).

Here is an excerpt from the stack trace:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.Throwable.<init>(Throwable.java)
	at java.lang.NullPointerException.<init>(NullPointerException.java:63)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.ui.DefaultVariablesContentProvider.getVariableChildren(DefaultVariablesContentProvider.java:23)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.expression.ExpressionViewContentProvider.getModelSpecificExpressionChildren(ExpressionViewContentProvider.java:60)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.expression.ExpressionViewContentProvider.getChildren(ExpressionViewContentProvider.java:44)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.getRawChildren(AbstractTreeViewer.java:662)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.getFilteredChildren(StructuredViewer.java:454)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer.getSortedChildren(StructuredViewer.java:558)
	at org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer$1.run(AbstractTreeViewer.java:307)
	at org.eclipse.swt.custom.BusyIndicator.showWhile(BusyIndicator.java:69)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.createChildren(AbstractTreeViewer.java:295)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.internalExpandToLevel(AbstractTreeViewer.java:854)
	at
org.eclipse.jface.viewers.AbstractTreeViewer.expandToLevel(AbstractTreeViewer.java:450)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.views.expression.ExpressionViewEventHandler$1.run(ExpressionViewEventHandler.java:63)
(entries removed)

I will attach a screenshot showing the problem and the full log. I could
reproduce it on a new workspace.

Created an attachment (id=5317)
full log

Log created reproducing the error in a brand new workspace.

Fixed in ExpressionViewContentProvider and VariableViewContentProvider. A 
variable's value can be null, which resulted in the NPE. We should not consult 
the object browser in this case.
